document_data.name: Everwatch
document_data.mainbody: '''Everwatch''' was the [[divine realm]] of [[Helm]], the [[Faerûnian pantheon|Faerûnian]] God of Guardians.
document_data.Description: It was said to manifest as an aerial watchtower that apparated every time a ''[[portal]]'' was opened to its home plane.
document_data.Cosmography:
When viewing the [[multiverse]] through the [[Great Wheel cosmology|Great Wheel cosmological model]], Everwatch was observed to reside on the [[Outer Planes|Outer Plane]] of [[Mechanus]], the place of supreme order.

Utilizing the [[World Tree cosmology|World Tree model]], Everwatch could be found in the [[House of the Triad]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Everwatch was inhabited by a lone, unnamed guardian, appearing as an armored figure in a suit of [[mithral]] [[full plate]] mail. It was empowered with the ability to summon any of Helm's divine servants at a moment's notice.
